Package it.uniba.game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    Class containing the constants used in the application
    Usually the names are self-explanatory, therefore there aren't significant comments to do, except for some of them
    Class type : < no ECB >

    Responsibilities :
    Knows : The values of the constants values used in the App Does :
    Coordinates
    Class representing the coordinates used when accessing the chessboard
    Class type : < Entity >
    Responsibilities :
    Knows : A pair of coordinates of a Cartesian-like plain (as the ChessBoard) Does :
    Match
    Class representing a chess match
    Class type : < Control >

    Responsibilities :
    Knows :
    The current status of the ChessBoard Captured pieces by each player The history of the moves The current player The last long move done by a pawn Does :
    Parsifies the move given an input string Establishes whether the move is a Castling, a Capture or a simple one Checks whether the established move is legal and not ambiguous Executes the move, if legal Updates the status of Rooks and Kings in order to say if the former can be captured en passant, or the latter can execute Castling Records the captures done by the players Updates the color of the current player according to the flow of the game
    Move
    Class representing a generic move converted from the string inserted by the user.
    UI
    Class singleton used as User Interface
    Class type : < ECB >

    Responsibilities :
    Knows :
    Status of the current match If the user wants to quit the game Does :
    Parsifies a command given an input Handles a command in game, such as "board", "moves", ...
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Move.Castling
    Enumerated type used to represent the castling of the move.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MatchException
    Exception raised from the class Match in case of game errors
    Class type : < no ECB >

    Responsibilities :
    Knows :
    Does :
